# replaceTextStorage(_:)

**Instance Method**

Replaces the layout manager’s current text storage object with the specified object.

## Declaration

```swift
func replaceTextStorage(_ newTextStorage: NSTextStorage)
```

## Parameters

- **newTextStorage**: The text storage object to set.

## Discussion

Use this method to update the text storage uniformly for a group of related layout manager objects. Unlike changing the value in the textStorage property, this method replaces the text storage for all [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSLayoutManager] objects that share the current layout manager’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSTextStorage] object.

## Accessing the text storage

- **textStorage**: The text storage object that contains the content to lay out.
